Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $12,000. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at an exclusive price of $11,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure you receive unparalleled quality while also maximizing the value I receive for this product. I believe this price aligns well with both our interests and expectations. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
